CssAtDirective.name: keyframes
CssAtDirective.description: Defines set of animation key frames.

CssProperty.name: animation-name
CssProperty.description: Defines a list of animations that apply. Each name is used to select the keyframe at-rule that provides the property values for the animation.

CssProperty.name: animation-duration
CssProperty.description: Defines the length of time that an animation takes to complete one cycle.

CssProperty.name: animation-timing-function
CssProperty.description: Describes how the animation will progress over one cycle of its duration. See the 'transition-timing-function'.

CssProperty.name: animation-iteration-count
CssProperty.description: Defines the number of times an animation cycle is played. The default value is one, meaning the animation will play from beginning to end once.

entry.description: Causes the animation to repeat forever.

CssProperty.name: animation-direction
CssProperty.description: Defines whether or not the animation should play in reverse on alternate cycles.

entry.description: The animation cycle iterations that are odd counts are played in the normal direction, and the animation cycle iterations that are even counts are played in a reverse direction.
All iterations of the animation are played in the reverse direction from the way they were specified.
The animation cycle iterations that are odd counts are played in the reverse direction, and the animation cycle iterations that are even counts are played in a normal direction.

CssProperty.name: animation-play-state
CssProperty.description: Defines whether the animation is running or paused.

entry.description: Resume playback of a paused animation.
A running animation will be paused.

CssProperty.name: animation-delay
CssProperty.description: Defines when the animation will start. An 'animation-delay' value of '0' means the animation will execute as soon as it is applied. Otherwise, the value specifies an offset from the moment the animation is applied, and the animation will delay execution by that offset.

entry.description: There is no change to the property value between the time the animation is applied and the time the animation begins playing or after the animation completes.
The final property value (as defined in the last @keyframes at-rule) is maintained after the animation completes.
The beginning property value (as defined in the first @keyframes at-rule) is applied before the animation is displayed, during the period defined by 'animation-delay'.
Both forwards and backwards fill modes are applied.

CssProperty.name: animation-fill-mode
CssProperty.description: Defines what values are applied by the animation outside the time it is executing.

CssProperty.name: animation
CssProperty.description: Shorthand property combines six of the animation properties into a single property.
